content.title: Incredible Start! We’re on Our Way to Meeting Our Goals!
content.creator:
InstaServe
February 18, 2025
content.content:
Hey everyone,
We want to take a moment to thank each and every one of you for backing InstaServe! Your support means everything, and we're off to a strong start.
Let’s keep up the momentum, InstaServe will be on your table soon! Stay tuned for more updates as we push forward.
We’re just getting started!
